EASTERN MEDITERRANEAN SEA.
DNC 09.
1. VESSEL, 35 PERSONS ON BOARD, DISABLED AND
   ADRIFT IN 34-20.20N 018-30.50E. VESSELS IN
   VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT,
   ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO MRCC BREMEN,
   PHONE: 494 2153 6870.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 1890/22, 1891/22.
